attributes.action: Halt the proposed amalgamation and closure of Canon Pyon School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hereford Council have proposed the amalgamation and closure of some rural and local village schools much to the horror of the parents. Our local primary school in Canon Pyon is one of them. We the parents (and residents included) damand the re-think and indeed right to halt such a drastic event occuring.
